channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 17:48 Driven the threat of artebors to Pokrovskaya territorial community. Solve for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 17:48 Driven the threat of artebors to Pokrovskaya territorial community. Solve for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 17:40 The threat of shelling! Now in Pokrovskaya territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!
